column1: A visitation will be held Friday
column2: June 19 from 4:00 to 7:00 p.m. at Starbuck Lind Mortuary with a Rosary at 6:30 p.m.    The Mass of Christian Burial will be celebrated on Saturday
column3: June 20 at 9:00 a.m. at La Purisima Concepcion Catholic Church in Lompoc. Interment will follow in Lompoc Evergreen Cemetery. A reception will follow at Parish Hall located at the corner of I Street and Olive Avenue in Lompoc.
